text: Bay 21 is a two condominium buildings comprising the Bay 21 Condominium and Bay 21 TOO located near the Likas Bay in Kota Kinabalu. The first building consists of 26-storey with 286 units of floor space ranging from 395 square feet to 1,248 square feet. Bay 21 is designed by architect Lo Su Yin. == References == Category:Buildings and structures in Kota Kinabalu Category:Condominiums in Malaysia
title: Bay 21
